definition: a small fragment of something broken off from the whole, come off in flakes or thin small pieces
details:
noun
- a small fragment of something broken off from the whole
= synonyms: chip
- a person with an unusual or odd personality
= synonyms: eccentric
- a crystal of snow
= synonyms: snowflake
verb
- come off in flakes or thin small pieces
= synonyms: peel
- cover with flakes or as if with flakes
- form into flakes
= example: form into flakes
